ability.Rain Dish: This Pokemon restores 1/16 of its max HP at the end of each turn during Rain.

Hydro Pump.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Hurricane.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

Psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
